summary: How many things are you capable to explain about you in seven minutes? That's what's our protagonists try in their "quick dates" session. From here, each one tries to do their best to know the ideal love.
cast: Marta Etura|Pilar Castro|Luis Callejo|Toni Acosta|Antonio Garrido|Asier Etxeandia|Juanma Cifuentes|Cristina Alcázar|Aitor Mazo|Pedro Casablanc|Jorge de Juan|Tatiana Astengo|Sonia Lázaro|Daniel Carrillo|Estrella Alonso|Rachel Lascar|Víctor Barba|Miguel Ángel Calvo|Empar Canet|Juan Montañana|Sara Deray|Marc Andreu|Cristina Rodríguez|Lara Sanchís|Paco Catalá|Carlota Guivernau|Mercedes Castro|Ignacio Durán|Javier Pérez-Acebrón|Mónica Vic|Víctor Duplá|Joy Rodríguez|Ángel Díaz de Rada|Daniela Féjerman|Aina Requena|Juan Borrell|Brenda Lorena Garcia|Ariadna Gil|Manuel Hidalgo|Marc Manero|Vanessa Terkes
title: 7 minutos
